meanings.definition: A transportation service for individuals with disabilities.
meanings.sent1: The paratransits arrived promptly to take the passengers to their appointments.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on paratransits to get to work or medical appointments.
meanings.sent3: The paratransits seemed to have a mind of their own, always knowing where to go.
meanings.sent4: The fleet of paratransits roamed the city streets like helpful giants.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the paratransits made them easy to spot from afar.

meanings.definition: The vehicles used for providing transportation services for individuals with disabilities.
meanings.sent1: The paratransits were equipped with wheelchair ramps for easy access.
meanings.sent2: The fleet of paratransits included vans, buses, and even smaller cars.
meanings.sent3: One of the paratransits decided to take a detour through the park, much to the passengers' delight.
meanings.sent4: The paratransits lined up in perfect formation, ready to serve those in need.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the paratransits' engines signaled help and support for the community.
